ygData.subject: Re: Grim Aura
ygData.msgSnippet: personally ive liked even the idea of the necro when i heard about it while eq was still in development.  i have to say i like the class, and we really do have
ygData.messageBody:
personally ive liked even the idea of the necro when i heard about it while
eq was still in development. i have to say i like the class, and we really
do have many advantages that other classes dont get. the ability to heal
ourselves in combat while doing DD is very good, as is having a pet skel.
our mastery over the undead is great too. the only bad thing is getting KOS
by a great deal of npc's, but there has to be a trade-off somewhere.

other classes i was looking at for a second character was either a druid or
a shaman- both seem to have a pretty broad base of spells. an enchanter may
also be good, but i havent decided =)

belphenor


>From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>
>I have a wizard who is 14th and I just started a necro and am 2nd lvl. ..
>
>I think Necromancer may be the way to go but I would like to hear your
>opinions, how is the high lvl Necro stuff going? Can you hold your own???
>I like my 14th lvl wizard and I think I might just use both classes but I'd
>like to hear input . . .
>
>Thanks!
>
